con:testCase.name: Scenario 1 ULC DELETE Should not cause MAC deleted
con:testCase.con:description: 1. Create account user sts 2. TOU MUC(MAC Implicit create) 3. Create ULC 4. Delete ULC - policy delete by ID 5. Obtain assertion from form auth 6. Verify MAC is not deleted 7. Verify any other policy is not deleted by counting the total no. of policies returned by policy list.

Call Set PEM File for PolicyDeleteULC
Copy of Set PolicyClass as MAC
Policy GET MAC After ULC Delete

con:restRequest.name: Policy GET MAC After ULC Delete
